attributes.action: Review the new Homeoffice Uk Feb 2025 naturalisation rules under good character.
attributes.additional_details:
Review the policy. The bar should not be permanent, and the government must consider that some people may be working in public services such as NHS which is in crisis.

Some may be self employed.
attributes.background:
Amendments add time scales, rather then permanent ban, some people been in the UK over 20 years

Applicants should have right of appeal in court.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Reverse guidance stopping refugees gaining citizenship
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717817
